bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Determining the Effects of High Temperature Operation on Conductors, Connectors, and Accessories
IEEE Guide for Determining the Effects of High Temperature Operation on Conductors, Connectors, and Accessories

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this guide is to provide general recommendations for consideration when designing new overhead transmission lines that will be operated at high temperatures. It may also evaluate existing transmission lines for operation at higher temperatures. Although this guide is intended for overhead transmission lines, most of the discussion will also be applicable to distribution lines.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
